channel.title: EU on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in EU on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: The Encryption Debate in the European Union
item.description: Authors: Koomen, Maria and Koomen, Maria Published: May 2019 URL: https://carnegieendowment.org/2019/05/30/encryption-debate-in-european-union-pub-79220 Abstract: The Encryption Debate in the European Union is a policy brief that describes the intensifying encryption debate in the European Union, the interests and actors involved, and a possible timeline and substance of potential legislation. While encryption had largely thrived in Europe since the 1990s, the occurrence of multiple terror attacks in the late 10â€™s sparked a debate about encryption and national security within the EU.
